metadata.title: Catalogue des livres qui se trouvent chez Crapart, libraire, place Saint-Michel
metadata.creator: Crapart, Jean-Baptiste-Nicolas,-1815
Crapart, Jean-Baptiste-Nicolas, -1815
metadata.description: Letter of transmittal advertising Etrennes mignones, curieuses et utiles and La pyramide de neige at head of title
Letter at head of title dated partially in ms.: A Paris, ce [11 8bre] 178[4]; signed in ms.: Crapart
List of titles with prices in contemporary ms.: Fourni à Monsieur David par Crapart le 4 8bre 1783; addressed in same hand to: Monsieur David imprimeur libraire à Aix
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, stained, torn, and/or loose pages. Text extends off of the edge of the page. Title and cover page are combined.
